define: Use this api to get the logistics tracking information of a booking.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

","name":"booking_sn","sample":"201201E81SYYKE","type":"string","required":"True","key":"zGrAyc"}],"response_params":[{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"862fc4d77de74edf9bf045c7650f1988","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"xbfKEXf"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_auth","type":"string","required":null,"key":"AFjnfcs"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wwptCT"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"pMaQzzY","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

","name":"booking_sn","sample":"201214JASXYXY6","type":"string","required":null,"key":"rxHEFhz"},{"description":"

The Shopee logistics status for the booking. Applicable values.

LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CREATED:booking arranged shipment

LOGISTICS_PICKUP_DONE:booking handed over to 3PL

LOGISTICS_PICKUP_FAILED:booking cancelled by 3PL due to failed pickup or picked up but not able to proceed with delivery

LOGISTICS_DELIVERY_DONE:successfully delivered

LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CANCELED:cancelled when booking at LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CREATED

LOGISTICS_READY:booking ready for fulfilment

LOGISTICS_INVALID:cancelled when booking at LOGISTICS_READY

LOGISTICS_LOST:booking cancelled due to 3PL lost the parcel

","name":"logistics_status","sample":"LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CREATED","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mQKCJT"},{"description":"

The tracking info of the booking.

","name":"tracking_info","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"wdstNSz","children":[{"description":"

The time when logistics info has been updated.

","name":"update_time","sample":"1587375600","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"KtsGSXi"},{"description":"

The description of booking logistics tracking info.logistics_status

","name":"description","sample":"Your parcel is ready to ship from the seller","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wWeTayD"},{"description":"

The Shopee logistics status for the booking. 

TrackingLogisticsStatus:

INITIAL

ORDER_INIT

ORDER_SUBMITTED

ORDER_CREATED

PICKUP_REQUESTED

PICKUP_PENDING

PICKED_UP

DELIVERY_PENDING

DELIVERED

LOST

UPDATE

UPDATE_CREATED

RETURN_STARTED

RETURN_PENDING

CANCEL

CANCEL_CREATED

CANCELED

FAILED_ORDER_SUBMITTED

FAILED_ORDER_CREATED

FAILED_PICKUP_REQUESTED

FAILED_PICKED_UP

FAILED_DELIVERED

FAILED_UPDATE_SUBMITTED

FAILED_UPDATE_CREATED

FAILED_RETURNED

FAILED_CANCEL_CREATED

FAILED_CANCELED

RETURNED

RETURN_INTIATED

","name":"logistics_status","sample":"PICKED_UP","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FJhWwDW"}]}]}]}
